summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Hogwarts Music Studio admin dashboard functionality. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend booking form significantly improved with proper 3-step process. Admin authentication system properly implemented with OTP verification. All admin endpoints correctly protected with role-based access control.
